# Final words

<!--bs4_book:start-->

The `bs4_book` HTML output format also provides support for enhanced HTML metadata, and for specifying your book's source repository in the `_output.yml` file. Read more about the features of this output format here:

https://pkgs.rstudio.com/bookdown/reference/bs4_book.html

Or use:

```{r eval=FALSE}
library(bookdown)
?bs4_book
```


<!--bs4_book:end-->

<!--gitbook:start-->

Read more about the features of this output format here:

https://pkgs.rstudio.com/bookdown/reference/gitbook.html

Or use:

```{r eval=FALSE}
library(bookdown)
?gitbook
```


<!--gitbook:end-->
